review: SMZ-TMP DS (sulfamethoxazole / trimethoprim):Cost was $ 1,500.00 my insurance would not cover. So I called dr informed about problem.  Two hours later my pharmacist notified my rx was ready. I paid .28 cents. Iâ€™m gonna start call pharmacy before I leave when giving a brand new rx. Would not allow me to insert copy from my pharmacy.   And did you notice ALL THE SIDE EFFECTS????

Bactrim (sulfamethoxazole / trimethoprim):In the 1960s and early 1970s, I would get a bladder infection usually the day after intercourse with my husband, who was not circumcised.  We were divorced after thirteen years and I never had another bladder infection. Bactrim was the only drug that worked for me and the doctor gave me a standing prescription during those thirteen years.  I still think it's wonderful !!!
Bactrim DS (sulfamethoxazole / trimethoprim):Second time on this drug. No issues the first time but this time it was horrible. Hives, chills muscle pain joint pain headaches

I developed extended-spectrum beta-lactamases(ESBL) urinary septicemia  in the hospital - the infection control Doctor -put me on bactrim after the IV antibiotics were finished.  Then I saw him 1 month later and he wants me on the bactrim twice daily for the rest of my life due to the urinary sepsis.  I have lost 13 lbs - needed to lose weight - but otherwise no problems with the bactrim

Bactrim DS (sulfamethoxazole / trimethoprim):I was having symptoms of a UTI for a few weeks, so I finally went to the ER when the pain got worse, they gave me Bactrim. 2 days after taking it (twice a day) I got flu symptoms/ a cold. Today is my 5th day on it and I feel awful, shortness of breath, so so tired and I feel so nauseous. And I'm still having pain when I use the bathroom so I don't even think Its working. Going to call the doctor tomorrow, I won't be continuing this medicine.

I almost did not take this drug because of all the negative reviews but I am glad I did.  I am 45 years old and I am African American.  I am in pretty good health.  I recently had a laparascopy by my gynecologist and developed swelling around the navel area.  The doctor prescribed this antibiotic to me.  I always read directions carefully before taking any medication and it says to always take with food.   I took it as prescribed and had no side effects at all!  I actually lost 11 pounds in 10 days!  WOW!  I needed to lose weight anyway I weighed 175 pounds and I am 5'9 now I am down to 164.5 pounds.  My appetite had slightly decreased and it remains decreased since I stopped taking it which is good I use to get the munchies so it did something to my thought process when it comes to food.I encourage people to always research drugs before taking them but do not give a lot of weight on reviews and try the medication.  You never know how it works until you take it and I am glad I did.  It helped me both heal, lose weight and stopped my junk food cravings!  I am happy with results!

Bactrim (sulfamethoxazole / trimethoprim):I used to get chronic bladder infections, especially after intercourse.  It did not matter how clean I thought I was or what I did to prevent them, I would still get them.  I take 1/2 tablet of Bactrim after intercourse, as prescribed by my doctor, and I never get a bladder infection. Yay!

Bactrim (sulfamethoxazole / trimethoprim):I started taking Bactrim on a Tuesday. By Wednesday I was depressed and had terrible knots in my stomach. I was going to bathroom almost every hours and had hives all day and night. Thursday, I felt a lot better and my symptoms were mostly relieved as well. I thought it worth the hives and frequent bathroom breaks. On Friday my lips, gums, tongue and face were all swollen. I didn't think it was the medication at all. Doc's nurse called to tell me that my culture came back and that they are switching my medicine.When I changed the medicine on Saturday I had sores in my mouth along with the swollen gums. I made a dental appointment thinking that it is due to an immunization problem, by Sunday I called my doctor and learnt that I developed allergies.
